video.title: Grey's Anatomy
video.synopsis: Intern (and eventual resident) Meredith Grey finds herself caught up in personal and professional passions with fellow doctors at a Seattle hospital.

episodes.synopsis: First-year intern Meredith Grey, the daughter of a famous surgeon, meets her fellow interns on her first day at Seattle Grace Hospital.
episodes.title: A Hard Day's Night

episodes.synopsis: Meredith puts her career on the line to save a newborn in the hospital nursery.
episodes.title: The First Cut Is the Deepest

episodes.synopsis: Interns compete to treat severe injuries as the emergency room fills with an assortment of patients from the annual bike-messenger race.
episodes.title: Winning a Battle, Losing the War

episodes.synopsis: Cristina's encounter with a former nurse, now a patient at Seattle Grace, changes her forever.
episodes.title: No Man's Land

episodes.synopsis: Meredith believes she may have erred during surgery and endangered her career, and Izzie tries to throw a party for her new boyfriend.
episodes.title: Shake Your Groove Thing

episodes.synopsis: Alex works hard to gain the trust of Annie, a shy patient with a gargantuan tumor, only to make a fool of himself in front of her later.
episodes.title: If Tomorrow Never Comes

episodes.synopsis: Derek and Meredith try to be discreet after spending the night together at her house.
episodes.title: The Self-Destruct Button

episodes.synopsis: Meredith becomes disenchanted with her ignorance of parts of Derek's life.
episodes.title: Save Me

episodes.synopsis: The outbreak of a sexually transmitted disease affects several members of the hospital staff.
episodes.title: Who's Zoomin' Who?

episodes.synopsis: As Meredith and Cristina discuss their relationship woes at the Emerald City Bar, the bartender collapses.
episodes.title: Raindrops Keep Falling On My Head

episodes.synopsis: When a family arrives at Seattle Grace after a serious car accident, Alex learns that their injuries are only the beginning of their problems.
episodes.title: Enough Is Enough (No More Tears)

episodes.synopsis: Family secrets become public when Meredith's mother is brought to Seattle Grace for surgery.
episodes.title: Make Me Lose Control

episodes.synopsis: Cristina proves to be a difficult patient as she continues to recover, and Meredith's mother keeps the hospital staff running in circles.
episodes.title: Deny, Deny, Deny

episodes.synopsis: Meredith must use more than medicine when a girl's traditionalist, religious father forbids her to have a life-saving operation.
episodes.title: Bring the Pain

episodes.synopsis: A train crash brings several seriously injured patients to the hospital, providing a distraction for Meredith as she awaits Derek's final decision.
episodes.title: Into You Like a Train

episodes.synopsis: A male patient who seems to have a hysterical pregnancy fascinates the staff.
episodes.title: Something to Talk About

episodes.synopsis: Derek and Addison's close friends come to Seattle Grace seeking radical surgery to avoid breast and ovarian cancer.
episodes.title: Let It Be

episodes.synopsis: The Thanksgiving holiday is more difficult for the interns and residents than any of them is willing to admit.
episodes.title: Thanks for the Memories

episodes.synopsis: A man who has priapism comes to the hospital, and Meredith awkwardly realizes that he is her one-night stand.
episodes.title: Much Too Much

episodes.synopsis: Cristina has little sympathy for an inmate who jeopardizes her health to get out of solitary confinement.
episodes.title: Owner of a Lonely Heart

episodes.synopsis: Burke and Yang disagree on how to treat a young boy who does not seem to want a needed heart transplant.
episodes.title: Grandma Got Run Over by a Reindeer

episodes.synopsis: Izzie cannot ignore the chemistry she shares with a patient awaiting a heart transplant; George treats Bex, a teenage hermaphrodite.
episodes.title: Begin the Begin

episodes.synopsis: George must discharge an elderly patient who is no longer sick, but he refuses to leave the hospital.
episodes.title: Tell Me Sweet Little Lies

episodes.synopsis: The nurses go on strike, leaving the doctors to fend for themselves; an elderly patient's friends bring Meredith's mistake to light.
episodes.title: Break on Through

episodes.synopsis: Meredith's premonition of having a bad day is realized when a medical case arrives threatening the lives of everyone in the OR.
episodes.title: It's the End of the World

episodes.synopsis: Despite the best efforts of the Seattle Grace staff, the code-black situation escalates.
episodes.title: As We Know It

episodes.synopsis: Burke learns Cristina's secret, and someone from Derek and Addison's past arrives in Seattle.
episodes.title: Yesterday

episodes.synopsis: Meredith and George suddenly find themselves at odds at work; Bailey finds herself treating Addison for an unusual feminine issue.
episodes.title: What Have I Done to Deserve This?

episodes.synopsis: It becomes a bad day for Cristina when Bailey instructs her to take care of her baby; Derek and Addison come to terms with their relationship.
episodes.title: Band-Aid Covers the Bullet Hole

episodes.synopsis: When a series of deaths occurs at Seattle Grace, the uncanny events bring out the doctors' superstitious sides.
episodes.title: Superstition

episodes.synopsis: George begins to overstay his welcome, Meredith learns a secret about her father, and Bailey gets back into a surgery room.
episodes.title: The Name of the Game

episodes.synopsis: Izzie grills George about the personal details of his life; Addison takes Alex to task about a sensitive case; Burke treats his musical hero.
episodes.title: Blues for Sister Someone

episodes.synopsis: The interns care for a family involved in a car accident; Burke and Izzie have a new suggestion for Denny.
episodes.title: Damage Case

episodes.synopsis: Meredith must work with Callie for a day, and Burke and Izzie continue to search for a new heart for Denny.
episodes.title: 17 Seconds

episodes.synopsis: Pressure to find a new heart for Denny increases; Callie confronts George about his feelings for her.
episodes.title: Deterioration of the Fight or Flight Response

episodes.synopsis: Denny undergoes his heart transplant.
episodes.title: Losing My Religion

episodes.synopsis: Izzie copes with a great loss; Meredith faces decisions about her future after her liaison with Derek.
episodes.title: Time Has Come Today

episodes.synopsis: Cristina meets Burke's parents, the interns campaign for Izzie's reinstatement, and Addison takes a break from her hospital duties.
episodes.title: I Am a Tree

episodes.synopsis: Cristina helps Preston cope with his hand tremor; Izzie returns to the hospital for the first time since she quit the program.
episodes.title: Sometimes a Fantasy

episodes.synopsis: Addison doubts her abilities; Cristina pushes Burke's rehabilitation; an intern suffers a medical emergency.
episodes.title: What I Am

episodes.synopsis: Bailey treats a young mother battling breast cancer, and Derek learns more about Mark and Addison's relationship.
episodes.title: Oh, the Guilt

episodes.synopsis: Cristina draws the envy of the other doctors when she scrubs in for a special procedure.
episodes.title: Let the Angels Commit

episodes.synopsis: The men of Seattle Grace go on a camping trip, and Meredith assists with a procedure Sloan has never experienced.
episodes.title: Where the Boys Are

episodes.synopsis: The O'Malley family visits George at the hospital; Meredith determines to have a more positive outlook on life.
episodes.title: Staring at the Sun

episodes.synopsis: A traumatic car accident fills the ER, and Cristina has a crisis of conscience about her deceptive teamwork with Burke.
episodes.title: From a Whisper to a Scream

episodes.synopsis: Recent events strain Burke and Cristina's relationship, and Meredith's half-sister enters the hospital.
episodes.title: Don't Stand So Close to Me

episodes.synopsis: George's father has surgery for his cancer; Thatcher Grey arrives to see his new granddaughter; Meredith finds that Derek has trouble sleeping.
episodes.title: Six Days: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Mark is furious with Addison; George's father continues to recover after his surgery.
episodes.title: Six Days: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Bailey proposes the creation of a free clinic; a Seattle Grace doctor receives a proposal.
episodes.title: Great Expectations

episodes.synopsis: The doctors compete for Richard's affections, and a surgical patient endangers the lives of those around her.
episodes.title: Wishin' and Hopin'

episodes.synopsis: A ferryboat accident on triage training day tests the interns.
episodes.title: Walk on Water

episodes.synopsis: Meredith's friends and fellow doctors work to save her life after her near-drowning.
episodes.title: Drowning on Dry Land

episodes.synopsis: Meredith flatlines and gets a visit from Denny and Dylan in the afterlife. Derek works to bring her back from the brink.
episodes.title: Some Kind of Miracle

episodes.synopsis: The race for chief heats up as a new competitor comes forward, and Callie must reveal a big secret.
episodes.title: Scars and Souvenirs

episodes.synopsis: George meets his father-in-law, Alex helps Jane Doe determine how the world will see her, and Izzie wrestles with a startling revelation.
episodes.title: My Favorite Mistake

episodes.synopsis: Izzie faces her past and finds comfort in George, Alex has an attachment to Jane Doe, and Meredith and Derek question their status.
episodes.title: Time After Time

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is extra-attentive to a patient who is the chairman of the hospital board; Cristina helps Burke plan the wedding.
episodes.title: Desire

episodes.synopsis: Addison takes a temporary leave from Seattle Grace and visits old friends in Los Angeles.
episodes.title: The Other Side of This Life: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Addison takes a temporary leave from Seattle Grace and visits old friends in Los Angeles; Cristina continues -- reluctantly -- to plan her wedding.
episodes.title: The Other Side of This Life: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The interns take their first-year medical exams, and the residents tend to three injured mountain climbers.
episodes.title: Testing 1-2-3

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and Burke's wedding day arrives; the interns get their exam results; Callie and George make a decision about their relationship.
episodes.title: Didn't We Almost Have it All?

episodes.synopsis: Cristina, back from her honeymoon trip, searches in vain for Burke; Meredith, Cristina, Izzie and Alex spend their first day as residents.
episodes.title: A Change Is Gonna Come

episodes.synopsis: The residents and interns treat the victims of a massive explosion at an apartment building. Mama Burke returns to collect her son's things.
episodes.title: Love/Addiction

episodes.synopsis: George's skills dazzle the new interns, and Meredith halfheartedly helps Lexie with her first emergency patient.
episodes.title: Let the Truth Sting

episodes.synopsis: Izzie gets an unexpected reaction when she reveals her feelings about George to a mutual friend.
episodes.title: The Heart of the Matter

episodes.synopsis: On Halloween, Alex receives an unexpected visit from a former patient, and Meredith thinks her mother's ashes are haunting her.
episodes.title: Haunt You Every Day

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and Izzie find themselves competing for the same surgeries and the favor of the doctors performing them.
episodes.title: Kung Fu Fighting

episodes.synopsis: George and Izzie test their romantic chemistry, and Derek asks for more than a physical connection with Meredith.
episodes.title: Physical Attraction...Chemical Reaction

episodes.synopsis: Teenagers fill the ER after a school bus crash, and Bailey treats a patient who was her high school crush.
episodes.title: Forever Young

episodes.synopsis: An ambulance crash endangers the lives of the paramedics involved, and Bailey treats a patient who refuses her help.
episodes.title: Crash into Me: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Meredith furiously works to save the life of a paramedic trapped inside an ambulance, and Lexie holds a patient's life in her hands.
episodes.title: Crash into Me: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Bailey's family faces a medical trauma just as her marriage falls apart, and George's mother makes a surprise visit.
episodes.title: Lay Your Hands on Me

episodes.synopsis: Six weeks after Derek and Meredith end their relationship, Meredith, Alex, Izzie and Cristina compete in a surgical contest.
episodes.title: Where the Wild Things Are

episodes.synopsis: Addison returns to Seattle Grace to perform an operation and is surprised by all the changes in the lives of her former co-workers.
episodes.title: Piece of My Heart

episodes.synopsis: The nurses' complaints about Mark Sloan's trysts result in a date-and-tell policy; Cristina is forced to face her feelings for Burke.
episodes.title: The Becoming

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Wyatt refuses to let Meredith give up on therapy. Alex learns the truth about Rebecca's medical condition.
episodes.title: Losing My Mind

episodes.synopsis: Meredith and Derek get one last shot at success in their clinical trial, and the surgeons work together to free a boy from a block of cement.
episodes.title: Freedom: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Derek and Meredith's relationship is reinstated as the clinical trial comes to an end. Erica and Callie share an intimate moment.
episodes.title: Freedom: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Derek agrees to move in with Meredith, who airs her concerns to Cristina.
episodes.title: Dream A Little Dream Of Me: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After accidentally injuring Derek during surgery, Rose decides to transfer out of the department.
episodes.title: Dream A Little Dream Of Me: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A plumbing leak becomes a flood and wreaks havoc at Seattle Grace. The chief attempts to implement new teaching policies.
episodes.title: Here Comes The Flood

episodes.synopsis: Meredith gets upset when Derek finds her mother's diary, and Callie worries about her first "official" date with Erica.
episodes.title: Brave New World

episodes.synopsis: Bailey heads up a "domino procedure," in which each surgery hinges on the one preceding it.
episodes.title: There's No 'I' In Team

episodes.synopsis: The chief gives Bailey new power. He also gives her a very difficult surgical assignment: remove a girl's inoperable tumor.
episodes.title: Life During Wartime

episodes.synopsis: The chief tells the residents that one of them will get a solo surgery, and a competitive frenzy ensues.
episodes.title: Rise Up

episodes.synopsis: Meredith's old friend Sadie becomes an intern at Seattle Grace, but Meredith's other friends aren't exactly welcoming.
episodes.title: These Ties That Bind

episodes.synopsis: Meredith, Cristina and Bailey come to Lexie and Sadie's rescue when a routine surgery goes horribly wrong.
episodes.title: In The Midnight Hour

episodes.synopsis: Cristina is awarded the first solo surgery among the residents, but she has to relinquish it and choose her replacement.
episodes.title: All By Myself

episodes.synopsis: Bailey teams with Seattle Grace's new pediatric surgeon, Dr. Arizona Robbins, to save the life of a young patient near and dear to her heart.
episodes.title: Wish You Were Here

episodes.synopsis: Derek's mother makes a surprise visit to Seattle and meets Meredith for the first time. Meanwhile, Owen and Cristina try to go on their first date.
episodes.title: Sympathy for the Devil

episodes.synopsis: Everyone in the hospital is stepping up to try to find the boy a new organ donor.
episodes.title: Stairway To Heaven

episodes.synopsis: Now that Derek has the engagement ring, he searches for the perfect way to propose to Meredith.
episodes.title: Beat Your Heart Out

episodes.synopsis: Addison, Naomi and Sam rush the ailing Archer to Seattle Grace and reunite with old friends Derek and Mark to help save his life.
episodes.title: Before And After

episodes.synopsis: Derek's confidence is shaken as he faces off with Addison over the best course of action for their dying pregnant patient.
episodes.title: An Honest Mistake

episodes.synopsis: After learning at a deposition that more of his patients have died than survived, Derek decides to quit, but Meredith refuses to give up on him.
episodes.title: I Will Follow You Into the Dark

episodes.synopsis: After his fellow surgeons try and fail to bring Derek back to work, Meredith must summon the strength to convince him.
episodes.title: Stand By Me

episodes.synopsis: All eyes are on Derek as he is set to perform his first surgery after his breakdown. Owen has another PTSD episode.
episodes.title: Elevator Love Letter

episodes.synopsis: Izzie throws herself into Derek and Meredith's wedding plans, but the stress of her illness takes its toll on Alex.
episodes.title: Sweet Surrender

episodes.synopsis: As the wedding preparations continue, several residents face the arrival of their parents at the hospital.
episodes.title: No Good at Saying Sorry (One More Chance)

episodes.synopsis: As Meredith and Derek prepare for the big wedding, a group of college students injured in a car crash is admitted to the ER.
episodes.title: What a Difference a Day Makes

episodes.synopsis: Izzie spends time with a fellow cancer patient and contemplates whether to undergo a risky surgery.
episodes.title: Here's to Future Days

episodes.synopsis: George delivers stunning news to Bailey, sending shockwaves throughout the hospital.
episodes.title: Now or Never

episodes.synopsis: The hospital staff is left to deal with the aftermath of George's passing.
episodes.title: Good Mourning

episodes.synopsis: Meredith and Derek consummate their marriage anywhere and everywhere, while Cristina and Owen are instructed to abstain from sex.
episodes.title: Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: Nervous that there will be layoffs in the hospital, the Seattle Grace residents compete to survive the cuts.
episodes.title: I Always Feel Like Somebody's Watchin' Me

episodes.synopsis: When Meredith and Lexie's father returns to the hospital with a failed liver, it's up to Meredith to save his life.
episodes.title: Tainted Obligation

episodes.synopsis: The residents of Seattle Grace and Mercy West vie for surgeries and their careers as day one of the hospital merger begins.
episodes.title: Invasion

episodes.synopsis: After a burn victim dies in the midst of a chaotic ER, the chief and board member Jennings interrogate the residents to find the culprit.
episodes.title: I Saw What I Saw

episodes.synopsis: When the hospital lab tech has an inoperable tumor wrapped around his spine, he turns to Derek to do the impossible.
episodes.title: Give Peace A Chance

episodes.synopsis: A generous donation is offered to Seattle Grace by the parents of Arizona's 10-year-old patient.
episodes.title: Invest in Love

episodes.synopsis: When Owen recruits his fellow Iraq war vet as the new cardiothoracic surgeon, Cristina questions the vet's abilities.
episodes.title: New History

episodes.synopsis: As Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's pass, Miranda is visited by her father, who disapproves of her choices in life.
episodes.title: Holidaze

episodes.synopsis: Mark flies Addison to Seattle to help with a difficult procedure on his pregnant daughter.
episodes.title: Blink

episodes.synopsis: After learning of Richard's drinking problem, Derek confronts him. Izzie returns, hoping to reconcile with Alex.
episodes.title: I Like You So Much Better When You're Naked

episodes.synopsis: As Derek begins his role as interim chief, he faces a potential lawsuit when Bailey and Meredith's patient awakens from anesthesia mid-surgery.
episodes.title: State of Love And Trust

episodes.synopsis: It's Valentine's Day, and the doctors must treat dozens of injured people after the roof collapses at a romantic restaurant.
episodes.title: Valentine's Day Massacre

episodes.synopsis: In his new role as chief, Derek restores the hospital lecture series.
episodes.title: The Time Warp

episodes.synopsis: When famous surgeon Dr. Harper Avery is rushed in, the staff is surprised to discover that one of their own is related to this legend.
episodes.title: Perfect Little Accident

episodes.synopsis: A patient who needs an extremely difficult surgery comes to Seattle Grace, and Richard and Owen vie for the opportunity to tackle it.
episodes.title: Push

episodes.synopsis: When Teddy's patient seeks to end treatment and her life, she turns to Hunt for help.
episodes.title: Suicide is Painless

episodes.synopsis: When Alex's younger brother shows up with a hernia, it's up to Alex to get approval for pro bono surgery.
episodes.title: Sympathy for the Parents

episodes.synopsis: Sloan returns to Mark's apartment just as she's going into labor, and Teddy, Mark, Callie and Arizona are there to help with the birth.
episodes.title: Hook, Line And Sinner

episodes.synopsis: Bailey preps the team with mandatory sensitivity training prior to admitting a 700-pound patient with compounded medical issues.
episodes.title: How Insensitive

episodes.synopsis: An elderly patient admitted into the ER for a heart condition sees a familiar face: a long-lost love who happens to be in the ER as well.
episodes.title: Shiny Happy People

episodes.synopsis: Seattle Grace Hospital is hit with a crisis like no other in its history.
episodes.title: Sanctuary

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and Meredith's surgical skills are put to the ultimate test.
episodes.title: Death and All His Friends

episodes.synopsis: The staff tries to deal with physical and emotional trauma in the wake of the vengeful gunman's deadly rampage.
episodes.title: With You I'm Born Again

episodes.synopsis: Meredith finally tells Derek about her pregnancy and miscarriage; during a surgery, Cristina experiences PTSD.
episodes.title: Shock to the System

episodes.synopsis: Issues surface when Derek's estranged sister, Amelia, visits unexpectedly; Meredith and Derek continue to try to ease Cristina back into surgery.
episodes.title: Superfreak

episodes.synopsis: Derek and Meredith visit the obstetrician and receive disturbing news; Lexie notices April and Meredith growing closer.
episodes.title: Can't Fight Biology

episodes.synopsis: As part of their training, Seattle Grace's residents are put in charge; the attending surgeons compete for a $1 million grant.
episodes.title: Almost Grown

episodes.synopsis: A documentary crew visits the hospital six months after the shooting to document the road to recovery for doctors and patients.
episodes.title: These Arms of Mine

episodes.synopsis: Owen puts the residents through a rigorous trauma-certification drill; Cristina is left alone to monitor an ill lung-transplant patient.
episodes.title: That's Me Trying

episodes.synopsis: Doctors try to save the life of a political figure from the Middle East; Cristina decides to decorate her new place and throw a housewarming party.
episodes.title: Something's Gotta Give

episodes.synopsis: Derek and the attendings go out to celebrate when he gets the grant he needs for his clinical trial.
episodes.title: Slow Night, So Long

episodes.synopsis: Teddy directs her efforts and compassion toward a dying patient without the proper insurance to seek treatment.
episodes.title: Adrift and at Peace

episodes.synopsis: A gunman open fires at a local college, sending mass casualties to the hospital; Arizona's return is not warmly welcomed.
episodes.title: Disarm

episodes.synopsis: Arizona tries to reconcile with Callie, who has big news to share; Teddy faces an important decision; the residents receive new interns.
episodes.title: Start Me Up

episodes.synopsis: Meredith feels left out when Derek breaks ground on his clinical trial; Bailey's new idea does not go over well with the chief.
episodes.title: Don't Deceive Me (Please Don't Go)

episodes.synopsis: Meredith and Lexie's father returns to Seattle Grace with stomach pains and a new girlfriend; Alex butts heads with the new OB.
episodes.title: P.Y.T. (Pretty Young Thing)

episodes.synopsis: Meredith volunteers to run the ER for a night in the hopes of proving that she's chief resident material; Bailey and Eli get into mischief.
episodes.title: Golden Hour

episodes.synopsis: Meredith's fertility treatments start affecting her eyesight; Mark talks to Callie and Arizona about his role as a father.
episodes.title: Not Responsible

episodes.synopsis: Richard tries to get Adele into Derek and Meredith's Alzheimer's trial; Arizona and Mark try to plan a baby shower for Callie.
episodes.title: This Is How We Do It

episodes.synopsis: A cataclysmic event leaves the doctors shaken; Callie, on the verge of a life-changing moment, starts having visions of the hospital and her friends.
episodes.title: Song Beneath the Song

episodes.synopsis: Everyone tries to help Callie and her baby recover; the death of a trial patient impacts Derek and Meredith in different ways.
episodes.title: It's a Long Way Back

episodes.synopsis: Callie and Arizona's wedding is not coming together as they hoped it would; Meredith and Derek make a life-changing decision.
episodes.title: White Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Work and personal pressures leave Meredith on edge; formal interviews for the chief resident position begin; Lucy and Alex's relationship is tested.
episodes.title: I Will Survive

episodes.synopsis: Meredith's dishonesty is revealed, leading to unexpected consequences for her and others; the new chief resident is chosen.
episodes.title: Unaccompanied Minor

episodes.synopsis: Meredith faces the repercussions of messing with the medical trial.
episodes.title: Free Falling

episodes.synopsis: Meredith and Derek's relationship concerns Zola's adoption counselor.
episodes.title: She's Gone

episodes.synopsis: The chief makes a decision that shocks everyone at Seattle Grace.
episodes.title: Take the Lead

episodes.synopsis: A stampede at a comic book convention leads to an influx of patients.
episodes.title: What Is It About Men

episodes.synopsis: The residents try to impress Jackson's mother, Catherine Avery.
episodes.title: Love, Loss and Legacy

episodes.synopsis: Meredith tries to get Derek interested in a patient's rare brain tumor.
episodes.title: Poker Face

episodes.synopsis: Owen organizes a baseball game against Seattle Presbyterian.
episodes.title: Put Me in, Coach

episodes.synopsis: Jackson's suspicions about Mark and Lexie interfere with work.
episodes.title: Heart-Shaped Box

episodes.synopsis: Teddy is called away on another case, as Henry is brought in for surgery.
episodes.title: Dark Was the Night

episodes.synopsis: Teddy asks Cristina to help with an O.R. patient.
episodes.title: Suddenly

episodes.synopsis: The doctors form two teams to operate on conjoined twins.
episodes.title: This Magic Moment

episodes.synopsis: Richard's 10,000th surgery is a liver transplant for two sisters.
episodes.title: Hope for the Hopeless

episodes.synopsis: Meredith dreams of what her life would have been.
episodes.title: If/Then

episodes.synopsis: Callie surprises Arizona with a romantic evening.
episodes.title: All You Need Is Love

episodes.synopsis: Amelia arrives at Seattle Grace to beg Derek to help with a case.
episodes.title: Have You Seen Me Lately

episodes.synopsis: As Adele's condition deteriorates, Richard considers making a change.
episodes.title: If Only You Were Lonely

episodes.synopsis: Derek asks Meredith to work with him in neuro again.
episodes.title: One Step Too Far

episodes.synopsis: An escaped lion puts lives and relationships in danger.
episodes.title: The Lion Sleeps Tonight

episodes.synopsis: Cristina makes Owen tell her about the intimate details of his affair.
episodes.title: Support System

episodes.synopsis: Richard faces a disturbing realization while visiting Adele.
episodes.title: The Girl with No Name

episodes.synopsis: The residents travel to San Francisco for the oral boards.
episodes.title: Moment Of Truth

episodes.synopsis: The residents agonize over their upcoming exam results.
episodes.title: Let the Bad Times Roll

episodes.synopsis: The residents choose their future positions.
episodes.title: Migration

episodes.synopsis: A dangerous situation leaves the doctors fighting to stay alive.
episodes.title: Flight

episodes.synopsis: Following a plane crash, the doctors of Seattle Grace try to cope with loss, adapt to changes and move forward with their lives.
episodes.title: Going, Going, Gone

episodes.synopsis: The doctors try to cope with heartache and injuries caused by the plane crash. Everyone at Seattle Grace struggles to return to normalcy.
episodes.title: Remember the Time

episodes.synopsis: The crash survivors must make a life-changing decision; tensions escalate between Jackson and April; Alex tries to restrain himself.
episodes.title: Love the One You're With

episodes.synopsis: Out of consideration for Derek, Meredith stops talking about her surgeries. Richard asks Dr. Avery to help with a complicated procedure.
episodes.title: I Saw Her Standing There

episodes.synopsis: Meredith and Cristina rely on each other as they face more responsibilities at their respective hospitals and cope with life after the plane crash.
episodes.title: Beautiful Doom

episodes.synopsis: As the doctors move forward with their lawsuit, they must face the realities of their injuries. Bailey tricks Arizona into assisting with a case.
episodes.title: Second Opinion

episodes.synopsis: Owen and Cristina navigate their relationship amid the pending lawsuit; Bailey and Ben argue over wedding plans.
episodes.title: I Was Made for Lovin' You

episodes.synopsis: Meredith asks Heather to help fix Derek's hand. Cristina sets Stephanie and Leah against each other in a competition.
episodes.title: Love Turns You Upside Down

episodes.synopsis: While the doctors prepare for Bailey's wedding, Richard helps her with her anxiety; Lizzie and Meredith butt heads.
episodes.title: Run, Baby, Run

episodes.synopsis: Bailey continues to put her wedding day on hold as she tries to save Adele's life; Owen and Cristina are unsure about their pending divorce.
episodes.title: Things We Said Today

episodes.synopsis: Derek, Meredith, Arizona and Cristina receive news about the plane crash lawsuit. Jackson takes on one of Mark Sloane's former patients.
episodes.title: The End Is the Beginning Is the End

episodes.synopsis: A new doctor at Seattle Grace puts others on edge; Arizona struggles with phantom limb pain; Meredith is faced with her worst fear.
episodes.title: Walking on a Dream

episodes.synopsis: Derek and April fight to find a solution for the hospital; Cristina works to respect the wishes of a dying boy's family.
episodes.title: Bad Blood

episodes.synopsis: Several of the doctors compete to be the new face of Seattle Grace. Alex and Jackson work with a transgender teen couple.
episodes.title: The Face of Change

episodes.synopsis: Owen is faced with tough decisions as Seattle Grace spirals toward financial ruin. Jo and Alex try to save an infant's life.
episodes.title: Hard Bargain

episodes.synopsis: As news of Seattle Grace's financial issues spreads, Catherine wants Jackson to move to Boston and the interns fear for their jobs.
episodes.title: This Is Why We Fight

episodes.synopsis: Discord and chaos created by new management causes one doctor to question his future at Seattle Grace.
episodes.title: Transplant Wasteland

episodes.synopsis: More positive changes are made by the hospital's new management. Meredith worries about her unborn baby.
episodes.title: Idle Hands

episodes.synopsis: A gas tanker explodes on a highway, resulting in multiple injuries; Jo and Meredith try to help a frantic woman, whose child has a mysterious illness.
episodes.title: Can't Fight This Feeling

episodes.synopsis: Unsettling news motivates Derek and Meredith to take preventive steps for their children's future.
episodes.title: She's Killing Me

episodes.synopsis: After several of Bailey's patients die, she becomes the focus of a CDC investigation. Cristina teases Alex about his feelings for Jo.
episodes.title: Sleeping Monster

episodes.synopsis: Bailey continues to shut everyone out. A magician's assistant needs medical attention after a trick goes awry.
episodes.title: Do You Believe in Magic

episodes.synopsis: The doctors prepare for a superstorm headed for Seattle. As Owen becomes closer to Ethan, his desire to be a parent gets stronger.
episodes.title: Readiness Is All

episodes.synopsis: As the storm rages, patients are brought to the hospital by the busload and resources dwindle; a doctor's life hangs in the balance.
episodes.title: Perfect Storm

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of a devastating storm, the doctors of Grey-Sloan desperately try to help the injured -- including two of their own.
episodes.title: Seal Our Fate

episodes.synopsis: Traumatized by loss, the interns are determined to become more tightly bonded. Cristina and Bailey are at odds over treating Richard's condition.
episodes.title: I Want You With Me

episodes.synopsis: While Meredith and Derek cope with sleep deprivation, Owen forces Jackson to be mindful of hospital finances and April waits for her board results.
episodes.title: Everybody's Crying Mercy

episodes.synopsis: A circus-themed fundraising gala could be the prescription for the hospital's financial woes, but the party leaves the ER seriously understaffed.
episodes.title: Puttin' on the Ritz

episodes.synopsis: Meredith is having trouble being both a great surgeon and a great mother, while Jo finds herself in a complicated relationship with a problem patient.
episodes.title: I Bet It Stung

episodes.synopsis: Research is at the forefront when Derek joins Callie on a brain mapping project and Meredith decides to continue her mother's work to get a grant.
episodes.title: Map of You

episodes.synopsis: The doctors have their hands full at Halloween, with Owen and Cristina operating on a man with unusual anatomy and Jo tending to a frightened child.
episodes.title: Thriller

episodes.synopsis: The feuding continues at Grey-Sloan, with Meredith and Cristina fighting over a new piece of equipment and Bailey on the verge of a nervous breakdown.
episodes.title: Two Against One

episodes.synopsis: Callie is put through the ringer when she undergoes a malpractice lawsuit, but her devoted father's support prompts her to try salvaging her marriage.
episodes.title: Sorry Seems to Be the Hardest Word

episodes.synopsis: While Meredith plans Thanksgiving dinner with Emma's help, Ben confides in Derek that he thinks Bailey has OCD, and Richard has a health setback.
episodes.title: Somebody That I Used to Know

episodes.synopsis: Cristina and Shane's relationship heats up in more ways than one, while April prepares for her wedding with the not-so-welcome help of her sisters.
episodes.title: Man on the Moon

episodes.synopsis: On her big day, April insists that Cristina and Meredith stop arguing -- but a disruption occurs anyway thanks to a big proclamation from Jackson.
episodes.title: Get Up, Stand Up

episodes.synopsis: Relationships are topsy-turvy at the hospital as Arizona and Callie reconcile, Derek breaks a promise to Meredith and Alex says goodbye to his father.
episodes.title: Take It Back

episodes.synopsis: With the new non-fraternization policy in place, the couples at the hospital are having a hard time juggling their professional and romantic lives.
episodes.title: You've Got to Hide Your Love Away

episodes.synopsis: Tension mounts among the doctors as more about the HR complaint is revealed. Callie and Arizona hash things out, but Callie gets bad news from Derek.
episodes.title: Throwing It All Away

episodes.synopsis: Richard gets an unusual birthday present when Bailey asks him to scrub in on an amazing surgery; Callie stands up for herself;Shane helps Cristina.
episodes.title: We Gotta Get Out of This Place

episodes.synopsis: A troubling case has Cristina imagining two futures: one in which she and Owen have children, and another in which her career reaches new heights.
episodes.title: Do You Know?

episodes.synopsis: The flu sweeps through the hospital, felling doctors and patients alike, so Meredith fills in for Derek at a big presentation about his research.
episodes.title: You Be Illin'

episodes.synopsis: Cristina plays it cool when she gets nominated for an important award, while Meredith tries to hide her jealousy, and Bailey seeks to save a young boy.
episodes.title: I'm Winning

episodes.synopsis: Cristina insists that she wants to attend the awards ceremony alone, Derek is overwhelmed, and April and Jackson quarrel over children and religion.
episodes.title: Go It Alone

episodes.synopsis: Big news hits when Richard learns the reason behind the awards committee selection, Alex decides to enter private practice, and April reveals a secret.
episodes.title: Change of Heart

episodes.synopsis: Cristina is thrilled when she receives a life-changing offer. Derek and his sister operate on conjoined twins, and Jo is having a hard time coping.
episodes.title: We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together

episodes.synopsis: Meredith explores her feelings about her time in Seattle, Callie receives devastating news and word spreads that a resident will be fired.
episodes.title: Everything I Try to Do, Nothing Seems to Turn Out Right

episodes.synopsis: The doctors bid an emotional farewell to Cristina Yang, a possible act of terrorism rocks Seattle and Meredith makes a life changing decision.
episodes.title: Fear (of the Unknown)

episodes.synopsis: Derek makes a decision about moving to Washington, D.C., Callie and Arizona consider surrogacy, and a new doctor, Maggie Pierce, joins the team.
episodes.title: I Must Have Lost It on the Wind

episodes.synopsis: Though having trouble adjusting to her new workplace, Maggie solves a thorny case and reveals a deeply personal secret to Meredith.
episodes.title: Puzzle with a Piece Missing

episodes.synopsis: Derek and Amelia tangle over a promotion, Arizona frets about having another baby, and Richard reveals to Maggie the truth of their relationship.
episodes.title: Got to Be Real

episodes.synopsis: While sparring with Derek over his decision to stay in Seattle, Meredith struggles to come to terms with Maggie being her half-sister.
episodes.title: Only Mama Knows

episodes.synopsis: Hoping it will salvage their relationship, Arizona and Callie undertake a 30-day trial separation, during which Arizona puts her job in jeopardy.
episodes.title: Bend and Break

episodes.synopsis: Bailey gets a wake-up call about her own health, Richard tries to make amends to Maggie, and Arizona learns an unnerving secret about Dr. Herman.
episodes.title: Don't Let's Start

episodes.synopsis: When Amelia's drug-troubled past comes back to haunt her, Derek tries to turn it to his advantage. Meanwhile, Jo performs her first solo surgery.
episodes.title: Can We Start Again, Please?

episodes.synopsis: Amelia believes she can save Dr. Herman's life, and Derek, facing renewed pressure to take the job in Washington, D.C., makes a big decision.
episodes.title: Risk

episodes.synopsis: Jackson and April deal with devastating news about their unborn child, and Meredith and Derek try to keep their relationship alive.
episodes.title: Where Do We Go From Here

episodes.synopsis: Richard helps Amelia through a crisis of confidence about Dr. Herman's operation, and Jackson and April clash over whether to end her pregnancy.
episodes.title: The Bed's Too Big Without You

episodes.synopsis: April and Jackson confront a heartrending decision about their baby, and Amelia gets a chance to test out the procedure for Dr. Herman's surgery.
episodes.title: All I Could Do Was Cry

episodes.synopsis: Meredith plans a trip to visit Derek but takes a secret detour. Callie starts dating again, and Dr. Herman discovers another side of Arizona.
episodes.title: The Great Pretender

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Herman's condition deteriorates while Amelia struggles with insecurities about the operation, and Arizona performs her first solo fetal surgery.
episodes.title: Staring at the End

episodes.synopsis: While Arizona and Bailey clash over how to save a pregnant patient, Amelia begins the intricate and grueling operation to save Dr. Herman's life.
episodes.title: The Distance

episodes.synopsis: When an earthquake hits Seattle, the team talks a girl through a risky procedure on the phone. Meanwhile, Meredith suspects Derek of cheating on her.
episodes.title: I Feel the Earth Move

episodes.synopsis: A man with Alzheimer's accidentally destroys the life of a young couple, causing Richard and Maggie to ponder the disease's effect on their own lives.
episodes.title: Don't Dream It's Over

episodes.synopsis: Derek has returned to Seattle, but Meredith still harbors doubts about his fidelity. Meanwhile, Owen discovers a distressing secret about his mother.
episodes.title: With or Without You

episodes.synopsis: A 15-year-old boy who killed two cops during a bank robbery needs an immediate liver transplant -- and one of the officers he killed is a match.
episodes.title: When I Grow Up

episodes.synopsis: A wife and a jealous lover cut off a chef's penis -- twice. Meanwhile, Derek leaves for Washington, D.C., but never shows up for his meeting there.
episodes.title: Crazy Love

episodes.synopsis: A plane crashes in downtown Seattle, raising the specter of the past for members of the team. Meanwhile, Meredith frets about Derek's whereabouts.
episodes.title: One Flight Down

episodes.synopsis: After stopping to help victims of a car accident, Derek's car is hit by a truck, and he's rushed to the hospital with serious injuries.
episodes.title: How to Save a Life

episodes.synopsis: Meredith and the staff feel the impact of losing one of their own; Jackson struggles with April's decision; Bailey and Ben argue about their future.
episodes.title: She's Leaving Home: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Months after Derek's funeral, Amelia struggles with her emotions; April plans to return; and Derek's part in Meredith's life continues to grow.
episodes.title: She's Leaving Home: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Things turn sour at the hospital when Richard calls off the wedding. Amelia berates Meredith for letting Derek die, and Maggie gets bad news.
episodes.title: Time Stops

episodes.synopsis: Jackson gives April an ultimatum about their relationship, Meredith makes amends with Amelia, and Richard and Catherine tie the knot.
episodes.title: You're My Home
